cs.RO, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SY. 

The paper discusses the importance of active perception in artificial agents, which is a key topic in robotics (cs.RO). The paper also mentions computer vision (cs.CV) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) as related fields. The use of computational tools to implement these ideas suggests a connection to machine learning (cs.LG). Finally, the focus on perception systems suggests a connection to control systems (cs.SY).
